thread.title: Jeffrey House
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Jeffrey House

author: Jeffrey House
title: Jeffrey House
text: I work the night shift and just got off work, the last thing I wanna do is sit around waiting for my car to get fixed. These guys had my two tires mounted, balanced, and a four wheel alignment done in 45min and I was able to watch it all while got done. Amazing service! Highly recommend to anyone
